price: Tuhan-mu tiada meninggalkan kamu dan tiada (pula) benci kepadamu1582,
footnotes: 1582.  Maksudnya ketika turunnya wahyu kepada Nabi Muhammad Ṣallallāhu ʻAlaihi wa Sallam terhenti untuk sementara waktu orang-orang musyrik berkata, "Tuhan-nya (Muhammad Ṣallallāhu ʻAlaihi wa Sallam) telah meninggalkannya dan benci kepadanya".  Maka turunlah ayat ini untuk membantah perkataan orang-orang musyrik itu.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
